Job Title: MSP - L2 Support and L3 Systems Engineers - M365/Azure - Award-Winning MSPs!
Ad Text:
Saul Recruitment - Specialising in recruiting top MSP talent across Oz & NZ!
  
Melbourne | $80k–$140k + Super + Training | Flexible WFH Options :-)
  
Join some of Australia’s most reputable, multi-branch MSPs – genuine local success stories with a trophy cabinet to prove it. These guys are growing fast, setting the standard, and building teams that thrive on collaboration, innovation and delivering real impact.
  
Why you’ll love it:

Cutting-edge projects – from cloud migrations to complex BAU, no two days are the same.
Supportive leadership – management that listens, guides, and invests in you.
Career growth – structured training, certifications and clear progression pathways.
Hybrid working – flexibility to balance office and home.
Team spirit – highly skilled engineers who share knowledge and lift each other up.  
This is more than a job – it’s a chance to be part of some of Australia's most dynamic MSPs that challenge the status quo, rewards initiative, and celebrates people who step up.
  
What you’ll be doing

Level 2 technical support and sys administration across multiple client environments for managed service customers
Project delivery (relevant for L3 Role) – especially cloud migrations and transformation projects!
Troubleshoot, diagnose, resolve or escalate complex issues
On-site client visits (you’ll be the face of the team at times)
Document and improve processes, always looking for better ways to do things
Jump into senior project work as needed – variety guaranteed
What you’ll bring

Prior MSP experience across a mix of: Windows, M365, Azure, On-Prem, Intune, Azure Virtualisation, Backup & DR, Networking, Security, Scripting
Happy to be “hands & feet” on site when required
Great communicator – written and verbal – with a friendly, customer-focused approach
Organised, adaptable, and able to juggle priorities in a fast-paced environment
A genuine team player who wants to contribute, learn and grow
  
What’s in it for you?
  
✔ Work with one of Australia’s most trusted, award-winning MSPs
✔ Be mentored by some of the sharpest engineers in the game
✔ Access ongoing training, certifications and development opportunities
✔ Exposure to emerging technologies you’ll want on your CV
✔ A truly collaborative, open culture that values people as much as outcomes
  
This is a real opportunity to shine – and to be recognised and rewarded for it.
  
$2000 Referral Bonus: Know someone perfect? Refer them and score $2000 if they’re successful! Feel free to use the dedicated referral link on my site :-)
Know someone who’d be a fit? Refer them and pocket $2000 if they’re successful!
